basics.name: Emerson David Warhman Cardona
basics.label: Full Stack Developer with more than 2 years of experience
basics.summary: +2 years of experience developing web applications. I have worked on the creation and design of new software projects from their initial stages, I have also maintained and extended existing projects. I have collaborated with multidisciplinary teams of up to 6 people

work.name: MyTeamAbroad
work.summary: I developed a system to request towing services through a mobile application. I automated the deployment processes of different applications and instructed other programmers so that they could carry out the deployment, improving the team's productivity

work.name: LeaderDAO.ai
work.summary: I created different modules for a comprehensive blockchain smart contract system that offers airdrop and launchpad services to its user base. I developed the websites that allowed users to interact with the system's smart contracts.

work.name: Consultfinhn
work.summary: Maintained and extended the functionalities of a back-office website for a pediatric clinic that allowed doctors to track their patients' clinical history and also schedule new appointments that were notified to both the patient and to the doctor.

projects.name: Unete Neopediatrica
projects.description: Back-office website for doctors in a pediatric clinic. It allows you to manage clinical records, view graphs for diagnosis and schedule appointments.

projects.name: Instatow
projects.description: Platform to request towing services through a web application. With functionality to view the status of the service and the location of the user and the driver in real time.

projects.name: LeaderDao
projects.description: Community-driven DAO and decentralized fundraising platform, allowing members to access and contribute to new and existing projects.

projects.name: Neurofrequencies
projects.description: Mobile application for health treatment using the novel neurofrequency method. It allows you to plan treatments and receive constant notifications.

projects.name: Clockwork
projects.description: System to pay payrolls in cryptocurrencies in a gradual and automated manner through the use of smart contracts. Save frequent payments, plan future payments and manage existing ones.

projects.name: HopNow
projects.description: Platform for online tourism. From the application you can select a tourist site from anywhere in the world and live the experience of a tour with the help of a specialized guide.
